    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c3, 0.00700000022, 0.00350000011, -0.360000014, 15
    def c4, 0.333999991, -0.666000009, 0.666000009, 2
    def c5, 0.333999991, 0, -0.333000004, 0.666000009
    def c6, 4, 0.333330005, -0.0500000007, 3
    def c29, -0.5, 2.82800007, 1, 1.5
    def c30, 5, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999
    def c31, 65504, 1, 2, 3
    def c32, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0
    def c33, 0.25, 0.0078125, 0.0625, 0
    def c34, 0.001953125, 0.064453125, 2, -1
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_texcoord2 v2.zw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5
    dcl_2d s6

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_4C9CEBB7_0.txt
texldl r8, c220.z, s15
mov r7, c13 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r7.x, r8.x, c220.w, r7.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    add_pp r0, c29.x, v1.xyxy
    mul_pp r1.xy, r0.zwzw, r0.zwzw
    mad_pp r1.xy, r1, -c29.y, c29.z
    mul_pp r1.xy, r1, r1
    mad_pp r1.xy, r1, -r1, c1.x
    log r2.x, r1.x
    log r2.y, r1.y
    mul r1.xy, r2, c29.w
    exp_pp r2.xz, r1.x
    exp_pp r2.yw, r1.y
    mul_pp r1, -r0.zwzw, r2
    mad_sat r2, r1.zwxy, -c3.xxyy, v1.xyxy
    mad_sat r1, r1, c3.yyxx, v1.xyxy
    mul r3, r2.zwxx, c1.xxyy
    mul r2, r2.xyxx, c1.xxyy
    texldl_pp r2, r2, s0
    texldl_pp r3, r3, s0
    max_pp r2.w, r0_abs.z, r0_abs.w
    add r2.w, r2.w, c3.z
    mul_sat r2.w, r2.w, c3.w
    mad r4, r2.w, c4.xxyx, c4.z
    mov r5, c5
    mad r5, r2.w, r5.xxyz, r5_abs.wwyz

    mad r2, r2.zzxy, r5.zzyw, r3
    mul r3, r1.xyxx, c1.xxyy
    mul r1, r1.zwxx, c1.xxyy
    texldl_pp r1, r1, s0
    texldl_pp r3, r3, s0
    mad r2, r3.zzxy, r4, r2
    mad r1, r1.zzxy, r5, r2
    mul r2, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx
    texldl_pp r2, r2, s0
    add_pp r1, r1, r2.zzxy
    add r2.x, r2.w, -c2.y
    mov_pp r3.xy, -c17
    mov_pp r3.zw, -c20.xyxy
    mad_pp r0, r0, c4.w, r3
    rcp r3.x, c18.x
    rcp r3.y, c18.y
    rcp r3.z, c21.x
    rcp r3.w, c21.y
    mul_pp r0, r0, r3
    dp2add_pp r0.x, r0, r0, c1.y
    dp2add_pp r0.y, r0.zwzw, r0.zwzw, c1.y
    mul_sat_pp r0.xy, r0, c6.x
    add_pp r0.xy, -r0, c1.x
    mul_pp r0.xy, r0, r0
    add r0.z, -r2.x, c1.z
    rcp r0.w, r2.x

    mov r2.x, c2.x
    mad_pp r0.w, r2.x, r0.z, -c23.x
    mul_pp r0.z, r0.z, c2.x
    min_pp r2.x, r0.z, c31.x
    rcp r0.z, c23.y
    mul_sat_pp r0.z, r0.z, r0.w
    mad r0.z, r0.z, r0.z, -c1.x
    mov_sat_pp r3.x, c17.z
    mov_sat_pp r3.y, c20.z
    mad r0.zw, r3.xyxy, r0.z, c1.x
    mul_pp r0.xy, r0.zwzw, r0
    mul_pp r3, r0.y, c22
    mad_pp r0, c19, r0.x, r3
    mad_pp r1, r1, c6.y, r0.w
    add r0, r0.zzxy, c1.x
    mul_pp r3, r0, r1
    max r2.yz, v1.xzww, c10.xxyw
    min r4.xy, c10.zwzw, r2.yzzw
    texld r4, r4, s5
    mad r0, r1.yyzw, -r0.yyzw, r4.zzxy
    add r1.x, r4.w, c6.z
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c6.w
    mov r4.x, c30.x
    mul r1.y, r4.x, c0.x
    min r2.y, r1.y, c1.x
    mul_sat r1.x, r1.x, r2.y
    mad_pp r0, r1.x, r0, r3
    dp3_pp r1.x, r0.zwyw, c30.yzww
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.x, -c6.w
    exp_pp r1.x, r1.x
    mul_sat_pp r1.y, r1.x, c7.w
    mul_sat_pp r1.x, r1.x, c15.x
    texld r3, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r3, r3.zzxy, c7.zzxy
    mul_pp r3, r3, c6.x
    mad_pp r0, r3, r1.y, r0
    mov r1.zw, c12
    mad r1.yz, v0.xzww, -r1.xzww, r7.xxyw
    dp2add r1.y, r1.yzzw, r1.yzzw, c1.y
    rsq r1.y, r1.y
    rcp r1.y, r1.y
    mul_sat r1.y, r1.y, -c29.x
    mov r3.xw, c29
    mad r1.z, c11.w, -r3_abs.x, r3_abs.w
    texld_pp r3, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r1.w, r3.w, r3.w
    mul_pp r3, r3.zzxy, c16.zzxy
    mul r3, r1.x, r3
    lrp r2.y, r1.w, r1.z, c11.w
    lrp r4.x, r1.y, c1.x, r2.y
    mul r1.x, c14.x, c14.x
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c14.x
    lrp_pp r2.y, r1.x, c1.x, r4.x
    mul_pp r0, r0, r2.y
    mad_pp r0, r3, c6.x, r0
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r0.zwyw, c9.y, c9.x
    rcp r3.z, r1.x
    rcp r3.w, r1.y
    rcp r3.xy, r1.z
    mul_sat_pp r0, r0, r3
    mul r1.xyw, r0.xwzz, c32.xzzy
    frc r0.x, r1.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r1.x
    mad r0.y, r0.y, c3.w, -r0.x
    mad r1.x, r0.x, c33.z, r1.w
    add r3, r2.x, -c28
    cmp_pp r3, r3, c1.y, c1.x
    mov r4.xy, c1
    mad r5, c28.xxyz, -r4.yxxx, r2.x
    mad_sat_pp r0.xzw, r2.x, c27.w, -c27.xyyz
    cmp_pp r2, r5, r3, c1.y
    dp3_pp r1.z, r2.yzww, c31.yzww
    dp3_pp r0.x, r2, r0.xzww
    add_pp r0.z, r1.z, c1.x
    mad r2.x, r1.z, c33.x, c33.y
    mad r3.x, r0.z, c33.x, c33.y
    mov r3.yz, c34.xxyw
    add r3, r1.xyxy, r3.yxzx
    texld_pp r5, r3, s6
    texld_pp r3, r3.zwzw, s6
    lrp_pp r6, r0.y, r3, r5
    mov r2.yz, c34.xxyw
    add r1, r1.xyxy, r2.yxzx
    texld_pp r2, r1, s6
    texld_pp r1, r1.zwzw, s6
    lrp_pp r3, r0.y, r1, r2
    lrp_pp r1, r0.x, r6, r3
    texld r0, v2.zwzw, s4
    dp4_sat r0.x, r0, c26
    add r0.yzw, -r4.x, c25.xxyz
    mad r0.xyz, r0.x, r0.yzww, c1.x
    mov r2.x, c6.x
    mad_pp r2.xy, v2.zwzw, r2.x, c24
    texld_pp r2, r2, s3
    mad r0.w, r2.x, c34.z, c34.w
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c8.w
    mad_sat_pp oC0.xyz, r1, r0, r0.w
    mov_pp oC0.w, r1.w

// approximately 157 instruction slots used (19 texture, 138 arithmetic)
